subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: A powerful and resilient runner who took up the sport at age 44, d’Elia emerged from the destitution of postwar Japan to achieve renown in the United States.
snippet: A powerful and resilient runner who took up the sport at age 44, d’Elia emerged from the destitution of postwar Japan to achieve renown in the United States.
